title: Abendau's Heir
description: Kare’s seen planets destroyed by the relentless expansion of his mother’s empire. Children killed. His own family murdered. With her power to manipulate minds she may be invincible. Only Kare might have the power to stop her. He has to try, or face the horrifying future his father foretold. But in opposing her, he risks everything: his friends, his loved ones… even his sanity.A fast moving Space Opera, epic in scope, Abendau's Heir combines gritty themes and military sci fi all told by close, memorable characters.
author: Jo Zebedee
